item.title: About Me
item.description: ~$ whoami Girish Kumar Feel free to contact me at 0xgirish@gmail.com Checkout my resume I am a Site Reliability Engineer, and currently building softwares to improve scalability and reliability of Zomato infrastructure. I like to keep things simple and a big fan of terminal based text editors :). In free time I watch anime or build things. Currently, I am building and maintaining platform to solve canary for Zomato’s async workload, I also maintain sms service and phone-verification service.
